title: Identifying Quantitative Data
question_text: Mr. Harris just installed solar panels on his home. Using an app that came with the panels, he can monitor his home's energy consumption in kilowatts on a given time period. Which of the following is an example of a quantitative variable?

choices.text: The number of kilowatts used during a particular month.
The type of material used in constructing the solar panels.
The week on which the panels used the most energy.
The year in which the panels produced the least energy.
The weather at Mr. Harris' home.
